Hotaru broke up the fight and Utakata left her, deciding that Team 7 would be capable in protect her. As she watched him float away in a bubble, she tried to convince him not to leave, but was unsuccessful in doing so.    While on the way to the clan's secret village, Naruto argues with her only for Yamato to devise a plan to convince Hotaru to accept their protection. Using his unique jutsu, Sai drew mountain leeches to fall on Hotaru, who freaks out and becomes afraid, causing her to accept Team 7's protection. When they reached the village, Team 7 leaves Hotaru with the Tsuchigumo clan and Hotaru thanks Naruto before he leaves. When Naruto left he saw the look on the peoples faces back at the clan's village, so he decided to return to check things out.     Source: naruto.wikia.com

characters.name: En no Gyouja
characters.description: En no Gyōja (役の行者) was the former leader of the Tsuchigumo clan and the grandfather of Hotaru.    Source: naruto.wikia.com

characters.name: Tonbei
characters.description: Tonbee (遁兵衛) is an elderly man who is a servant to Hotaru.   Voiced by Shōzō Sasaki.    Source: naruto.wikia.com

characters.name: Nangou
characters.description: Nangō (ナンゴウ) is a ninja who was helping Akaboshi to collect the Tsuchigumo clan's kinjutsu.  Voiced by Nobuaki Kanemitsu.    Source: naruto.wikia.com

characters.name: Chuusin
characters.description: Chūshin (チュウシン) is a ninja who was helping Akaboshi to collect the Tsuchigumo clan's forbidden jutsu.  Voiced by Yōhei Tadano    Source: naruto.wikia.com

characters.name: Benten
characters.description: Benten (ベンテン) is a ninja who was helping Akaboshi to collect the Tsuchigumo clan's kinjutsu.  Voiced by Chikara Ōsaka.    Source: naruto.wikia.com

characters.name: Akaboshi
characters.description: Akaboshi (アカボシ) is ninja who aims the learn the Tsuchigumo clan's forbidden jutsu. He appears to be the leader of his group.   Voiced by Akimitsu Takase.    Source: naruto.wikia.com

characters.name: Shiranami
characters.description: Shiranami (シラナミ) is the boss of the Magaki group. He wants to steal the forbidden jutsu of the Tsuchigumo Clan.    Source: naruto.wikia.com

characters.name: Dai Gama Sennin
characters.description: The Great Toad Sage is the oldest and most respected toad of all the inhabitants of Mount Myōboku. Because of his age, the other toads affectionately call him Great Honorable Geezer. He is famed for his highly accurate prophecies.  Being several thousand years old, he is the oldest and most respected among the population of Mount Myōboku. At his great age, the Great Toad Sage seems to constantly smile and tends to have his eyes closed or squinting. He is portrayed and described as being senile, and sometimes out of touch with his present situation, so he does tend to forget things easily and quite quickly. However, when reminded, he is still able to remember things and can easily tell things very precisely. As a sage, he is also very wise, and is quick to stop Shima and Fukasaku from bickering and encourages harmony. It would seem that unlike most other toads, he actually has respect for Jiraiya, and has urged both Shima and Fukasaku to cooperate with him

characters.name: Harusame
characters.description: Harusame was the former master of Utakata.    He was once Utakata's master and he had trusted him until Harusame tried to remove the Six-Tailed Slug from his body which resulted in Utakata transforming into the Six-Tails and killing him. Since then, Utakata has held a great grudge against Harusame and made him think a student and master bond is not something to be counted on. Tsurugi states that Harusame tried to remove the Six-Tails to save Utakata, but Utakata believes otherwise.    (source: narutopedia)

characters.name: Tsurugi
characters.description: Tsurugi was the head of Kirigakure's Hunter-nin.

characters.name: Yuura
characters.description: Yūra was a sleeper agent of Sasori. As a Sunagakure ninja, he served as a trusted member of the Kazekage advisory council of Suna for four years. He was also assigned to command the defense of Suna at the time Gaara, the Fifth Kazekage, was kidnapped. He was in charge of guarding the gate when Sasori lifted the jutsu that was blocking memories of him, Yūra killed all the guards to allow Sasori's partner, Deidara, into the village. Yūra was later used by Pain as a sacrifice for the Shapeshifting Technique, becoming a replica of Itachi Uchiha. This replica was defeated by Naruto with the Great Ball Rasengan. His corpse was later devoured by Zetsu.

characters.name: Ebizou
characters.description: Ebizō is called "Honoured Grandfather Ebizō" by the Sand villagers. He and his older sister, Chiyo, are highly revered in Sunagakure, and were known as the Honoured Siblings. He is Sasori's paternal granduncle.

characters.name: Jouseki
characters.description: Jōseki is a senior from Sunagakure. His foremost concern was the peacefulness of the village. He wasn't comfortable with Gaara's appointment to Kazekage, seeing him as little more than a failed and highly dangerous experiment. When the Kazekage was kidnapped by the Akatsuki, he mused it might be for the best and wanted to quickly elect a new Kazekage.

characters.name: Ittetsu
characters.description: Ittetsu is a genin from Sunagakure. He admired the Kazekage from the bottom of his heart and was part of the group of Suna shinobi who went to rescue the Kazekage from the Akatsuki. When he heard the Kazekage was revived, he was so relieved he had to cry, which Matsuri slugged him for.

characters.name: Yakku
characters.description: Yakku meets with Temari and Team 7 when they arrive in Sunagakure. He gives them the latest information concerning Gaara's abduction and escorts them to Kankurō.

characters.name: Sari
characters.description: Sari is a Genin from Sunagakure.    She's close friends with Matsuri and like her, she has a strong admiration for the Kazekage. She adores the Kazekage more than anyone except for her friend Matsuri and was willing to do anything to rescue him, even going to volunteer for the mission to save him.

characters.name: Fudou
characters.description: Fudō was part of the group of grave robbers who dug up four of the dead Twelve Guardian Ninja. He was the brute force of the group, and was usually shown paired up with Fuen.

characters.name: Fuen
characters.description: Fuen was a kunoichi who was part of the group of grave robbers who dug up four of the dead Twelve Guardian Ninja. She was the strategist and trap expert of the group, and was widely thought of as the weakest member of the team.

characters.name: Mabui
characters.description: The Fourth Raikage's assistant acts as a go-between for the Raikage and Kumogakure's forces, giving them his orders and keeping him updated on their progress.  She's a dark-skinned girl who is seen wearing a very formal attire during work hours, long earrings, and properly pulling her light-gray hair back into a bun except for the frontal part of it, which consists of two flat side bangs that fall along the sides of her face.  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Kihou
characters.description: Kihō (鬼鳳) is a shinobi who appears in the second Naruto Shippūden filler arc. He seemed rather blunt and went along with Rinji's strategies without complaints. Kihō also feared death to which he referred to as "going bon".

characters.name: Gozu
characters.description: Gozu (牛頭) is a shinobi who appeared in the second Naruto Shippūden filler arc. He is a subordinate of Guren    He is unsociable and quiet, making people unable to figure out what he is thinking, but his battle skills are without a doubt very dexterous. He relies on taijutsu and brute strength and preferred fighting alone. He holds a special sentiment towards Guren and was her most loyal subordinate, even stating "I will accompany you no matter where you go". The reason for this was that Guren saved his life while he was imprisoned by Orochimaru, giving him water when he was dying of thirst.

characters.name: Kigiri
characters.description: Kigiri was a shinobi who appeared in the second Naruto Shippūden filler arc.  Kigiri appeared quite laid-back compared to other members of the group. Also, he addressed Rinji as Aniki (Brother) on occasion. In addition, he seemed to be a bit of a gambler as he was shown playing cards with Rinji while in the hideout.

characters.name: Nurari
characters.description: Nurari (濡羅吏) was a shinobi who appeared in the second Naruto Shippūden filler arc.     Nurari enjoyed toying with his foes and constantly mocked them. He also was shown to be a bit of a drag queen when he whimpered feminine shrieks or moans whenever he was in danger. Another example was when Rinji, and later Kabuto, gave him a mocking stare, to which he remarked was rude.

characters.name: Bisuke
characters.description: Bisuke (ビスケ; English TV "Biscuit") is a ninken and a summoning of Kakashi Hatake.   He bears an uncanny resemblance to Gaara with a kanji imprinted on his head and dark rings around his eyes. However, where Gaara has the kanji for "love" (愛, ai), Bisuke has the kanji for "shinobi" (忍).   (Naruto wiki)

characters.name: Denka
characters.description: Denka (デンカ) is a ninja cat that lives with Nekobaa at an Uchiha supply base. Suigetsu mistakes him for a tanuki. His senses are sharp after sensing Sasuke's chakra and remembering him after the years apart

characters.name: Hina
characters.description: Hina (ヒナ) is a ninja cat that lives with Nekobaa at an Uchiha supply base. Suigetsu mistakes her for a tanuki.

characters.name: Kousuke
characters.description: Kōsuke (こうすけ) was a young toad that wore goggles. On Kōsuke's back is the kanji word for "gold" (金, kin).    He seemed to be a very happy and cheerful toad, and took orders almost directly.

characters.name: Manda
characters.description: Manda is the personal summon of Orochimaru.  Manda was the largest snake in the world, before being recently out-sized by his clone, Manda II. He easily towers over buildings, trees, and large rock formations. Due to his length, he is even larger than Gamabunta and Katsuyu, easily coiling around Katsuyu and having more length behind him, and he could open his jaws wide enough to swallow Gamabunta whole.  He is colored purple, and has black rings running down intervals on his body. He has massive fangs, though they are arranged in a way similar to that of a constrictor snake instead of a viper or other venomous snake species, presumably carrying venom in them from the way they were designed, and green eyes. He also has four horn-like protrusions on his head.

characters.name: Gameru
characters.description: Gameru is a ninja who possesses one of Iou's prototype ninja tools, Dako. Him along with Kusune came to Iou to get ninja tools but he refused to give some to outsiders. Gameru and Kusune fight Naruto Uzumaki and Neji Hyūga who are no match against Iou's ninja tools. When Iou gives Tenten his latest invention, Jidanda, Tenten easily defeats the two.     (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Iou
characters.description: Iou is a ninja tool inventor from Konoha and Shoseki helps him make these tools. Most of his tool creations are shown either be impossible to carry or serves no purpose at all. It is assumed he was relocated to the outskirts of the village due to the random explosions which he claims are "challenges" during his inventing. Team Guy (minus Might Guy and Naruto Uzumaki replacing Rock Lee) go to the Konoha Research Lab to retrieve more tools for the village. When checking up on their progress, they see that Iou and his assistant went down the research lab to work on Iou's newest weapon. Suddenly two ninja, Gameru and Kusune arrive to the research lab and demand new weapons from Iou. They both possessed two of his prototype weapons that Shoseki sold to them. Iou gave Tenten his newest weapon, Jidanda, which she used to defeat both the ninja. Iou took Jidanda back from Tenten after the ninja were defeated, saying more work needed to be done on the weapon. Years later, Tenten and Neji Hyūga return to the research lab to retrieve more tools for the village after its destruction.     (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Kusune
characters.description: Kusune is a ninja who possesses Iou's ninja tool, Tsuru-Kame. Him along with Gameru asked for ninja tools from Iou but he refused to give his ninja tools to outsiders. Naruto Uzumaki and Neji Hyūga fought Kusune and Gameru but were stalemated by Iou's prototype ninja tools. Kusune and Gameru were defeated by Tenten when she used Iou's latest ninja tool, Jidanda.     (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Shouseki
characters.description: Shoseki (笙関, Shoseki) is the apprentice of tool maker Iou.     He is an apprentice of Iou, and is helping him in his tool-making job. He often complains about hard work. One time he mistakenly sold Gameru and Kusune two ninja tools Iou created: Tsuru-Kame and Dako, to increase their budget.     (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Yaoki
characters.description: Yaoki (屋沖, Yaoki) is a ninja from Sunagakure and a subordinate of Gaara along with his partner Korobi. He is shown to be cowardly and wimpy around Gaara, due to him formally be a murderous maniac. When Konoha and Suna started to get along again, Yaoki was assigned on a team with Gaara to take out a group of bandits located between Suna and Konoha, which Team 7 was also assigned to. When Gaara was captured by an assassination squad from their village, Gaara tells them to leave because the squad after only him. Naruto runs into Yaoki and Korobi, seeing Gaara is not with them and asking them why they abandoned their friend. The two both wonder if Gaara is their friend. Yaoki and Korobi both assisted Naruto in Gaara's rescue and they tell him they're his friends. When their mission was accomplished, Gaara asked Yaoki and Korobi what they said and they happily tell him they're his friends.    (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Korobi
characters.description: Korobi is a ninja from Sunagakure and a subordinate of Gaara, along with Yaoki. Korobi was assigned on a mission along with Yaoki and Gaara to stop a group of bandits that were located between Suna and Konoha which Team 7 were also assigned to. He was shown to be cowardly and wimpy when Gaara due to Gaara's killing impulses which he got rid of after Suna's invasion. When Gaara was caught in a trap by Suna's assassination squad, he told Korobi and Yaoki to get away. Naruto runs into them, learning that Gaara was captured and asks them why they abandoned their friend. Korobi and Yaoki both wondered if Gaara is their friend. Korobi and Yaoki both assisted Naruto in rescuing Gaara. After their mission was finished, Gaara asks Korobi and Yaoki what they said to him and they happily say they're his friends.     (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Katazu
characters.description: Katazu is a swordsman who took his twin brother Kageki's identity after the accidental death of Shikazo. Kageki had loaned money to Shikazo but after the birth of his child, he asked to be repaid by him but Shikazo refused and a scuffle broke out which resulted him hitting his head on a rock hard enough to kill him. Kageki went to Katazu after that and he took his brother's identity while Kageki and his family went into hiding. Katazu purposely attracted Shikazo's pursuers while they went into hiding. Since then, Tsukado was tasked by his clan to carry out a vendetta against him but failed to defeat Katazu 34 times. The next day, Kanabun brought Katazu to Tsukado to profit off their fight. With Naruto's help, Tsukado was able to get the advantage but Naruto stopped their fight, noticing that Katazu couldn't have killed Shikazo. Katazu reveals the truth to Tsukado and he decides not to kill him. Kanabun and his gang try to force the two to fight again but the swordsmen and Team 7 chase them out of town.    (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Kanabun
characters.description: Kanabun is the boss of the Kanabun Gang. Him and his gang watched Tsukado's fight and loss against Katazu who killed his distant relative, Shikazo. After seeing his hidden swordsman's skills after the fight, Kanabun brings Katazu the next day to Tsukado so him and his gang can profit off their fight. When Katazu reveals that he didn't kill Shikazo and the fight ends, Kanabun and his gang try to get them fight again by force but are chased out of town by the two swordsmen, Team 7 and Mr. Ostrich with Kanabun saying they'll be sorry.  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Tsukado
characters.description: Tsukado is a master swordsmen of an unnamed clan who had a vendetta against a man that killed a relative of his, Shikazo. Tsukado was chosen with the task of avenging him by the killing the man who killed him, Katazu. He failed 34 times to defeat him. One day, Team 7 meets Tsukado and seeing his poor revenge skills, Naruto decides to train him. Though his lessons were unusual, he managed to get the upper hand in his next fight with the killer. Naruto stops the fight after noticing Katazu's sword wasn't even sharpened, saying he couldn't possibly kill his relative. He says that it was his twin brother, Kageki who killed his relative but it was an accident. Since then, he has been taking his brother's identity. The Kanabun Gang, who were profiting off their fight, try to get the two to fight again but with the help of Team 7 manage to chase them out of town. Tsukado is shown to be able to use chakra flow when using his sword.     (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Furofoki
characters.description: Furofoki is a Konoha medical ninja examining Jofuku flower in Jofuku Forest on the mountain of the same name. When queried by Naruto about her decision to live and work all alone on the mountain, she told him that's what she decided and it wasn't his business. She has a great understanding of the flowers and seems to have gathered quite a few of them, indicating that she may have either fought off the flowers' defenses or discovered a way to safely harvest them, either one being testament to her ability.    (source: naruto.wikia.com)

characters.name: Kandachi
characters.description: Kandachi (カンダチ, Kandachi) is a missing-nin from Amegakure and was Hanzō's right hand man.    Sometime after Pain killed Hanzō, Kandachi and a group of Ame ninja fled the country and went into hiding by taking over a village surrounded by a magnetic force that affects a person's chakra flow to the brain similar to genjutsu.     Like his superior Hanzō, he fights mainly using the Summoning Technique. He can command the Conch King with hand seals. All of the hand seals performed also give the Conch King a signal to use a specified technique. Kandachi has shown a rare ability to cast a genjutsu on his opponent though the Conch King. The magnetic field caused by the tree strengthens this genjutsu, as the magnetism disrupts a person's chakra flow, similar to a genjutsu. Kandachi can also command the Conch King to propel above water by using Wind Release.     When Jiraiya brought Naruto Uzumaki to the forest for training, they encounter Tanishi who tells them of Kandachi's takeover. Naruto (disguised as Tanishi) and Jiraiya, pretending to be captured, meet with Kandachi, surprised to see Jiraiya again. Naruto's cover is blown when the real Tanishi arrives and Kandashi decides to feed the villagers to the Conch King. Naruto fights against Kandachi and the Conch King but their techniques knocks Naruto down every time. In the end, Naruto defeats them both with his first Great Ball Rasengan.

characters.name: Sukune
characters.description: Sukune was a brave man who never gave up hope of defending his village against Kandachi. He was similar to Kaiza, and died in the similar manner trying to do the best for his countrymen. His son Tanishi at first, detested him, but when he saw the meaning of his death, began to love him. He was buried in the village's graveyard.  Jiraiya mentions that Sukune and his family were very kind to him when he visited the Genjutsu Tree Village the first time, and is sad to hear of his death when he returns with Naruto later. He is known to be respected in the village. The husband of Yone and the father of Tanishi. No noticeable skills- he is shown to be fairly strong from the civilian's standpoint, but his skills are not nearly equal to those of a ninja.

characters.name: Tanishi
characters.description: Tanishi is a boy from the Genjutsu Tree Village. Kandachi, a missing-nin from Amegakure, attacks and takes over the village, and kills Tanishi's father, Sukune, in the process.

characters.name: Yone
characters.description: Yone is the wife of Sukune and mother of Tanishi. She, along with the other women and children, was held hostage by Kandachi and his men when they killed Sukune and took over their village. Jiraiya stated that she and her husband Sukune were very kind to him the first time he visited the Genjutsu Tree Village.

characters.name: Kosuke Maruboshi
characters.description: Kosuke Maruboshi is a genin of Konohagakure, whom others called the Ten-Thousand-Year Genin (万年下忍, Mannen Genin).  Kosuke has been a genin for over fifty years, thus the reason others called him the Ten-Thousand-Year Genin. When he was still a child, he made a reckless decision that cost him the lives of his teammates. Feeling ashamed of this, he felt he was not worthy of being promoted beyond the rank of genin. Despite this, he continued to train arduously to improve his skills, something that was insisted upon him by Tobirama Senju. During his time as a ninja, he had served under the Second, Third, and Fourth Hokage and now apparently even the Fifth Hokage. At other points, he fought alongside Jiraiya and Sakumo Hatake.   Kosuke is an elderly man with his once black hair now grayed which he wears in a short ponytail. He wears a mesh armor shirt under a short brown sleeveless kimono as well as gray pants. He is usually seen with a smile on his face. He carries a metal pan that he uses for multiple reasons ranging from cooking in while out on missions to a weapon during battle. He also carries a ladle and a sword sheathed horizontally across his lower back.   Even though his official ranks is that of genin, he is skilled enough to become a Jōnin; a promotion he declined time and time again. He has shown considerable taijutsu skill, able to use only his cooking-ware to defend and maneuver against enemy attacks. He is also a skilled kenjutsu fighter and wields a sword and a hidden blade concealed in his prosthetic left leg, both of which he can use to strike with deadly precision. He also demonstrated the use of a unique technique which incorporated genjutsu along with kenjutsu to confuse and petrify his opponent, making it easier to strike them down.  When he was younger, he was taught many techniques by the Second and Third Hokage. His training under the Second has given him highly proficient skill in high caliber water release techniques, allowing him to use techniques such as the Water Release: Water Dragon Bullet Technique and Water Release: Water Encampment Wall. He also learned the Shuriken Shadow Clone Technique from the Third Hokage.  In addition to combat skills, Kosuke is a highly capable survival expert and cook.   He was placed on a team alongside Hayama Shirakumo, Tekuno Kanden and Naruto Uzumaki to guard the borders of the village after Orochimaru and Sunagakure's invasion of the village. He remarked that Minato had left behind a fine son, showing that he was one of the few people who was aware of Naruto's lineage.

characters.name: Hayama Shirakumo
characters.description: Hayama Shirakumo (白雲ハヤマ, Shirakumo Hayama) is a jōnin of Konohagakure that protected its borders after the Invasion of Konoha.     Hayama has long dull purple hair held in a ponytail. He also has a scar running down the right side of his mouth. He wears the standard Konoha shinobi outfit, albeit his uniform has short sleeves. He also wears a pair of fingerless gloves and carries a thin katana strapped horizontally to his back.     Hayama is very adept at Kenjutsu. With his sword he can use the Vacuum Sword technique which was able to fend off many Iwagakure ninja as well as weapons.     He is assigned to patrol the northern borders along with Tekuno, Naruto Uzumaki, and Kosuke Maruboshi after the Invasion of Konoha. Not long after they were ambushed by a battalion of ninja from Iwagakure. Hayama stayed behind to allow the other members of the squad time to escape and report to the village. He summoned a crossbow with explosive tags attached to the projectiles and along with Tekuno wiped out the majority of the ninja. Together the team was able to wipe out dozens of Iwa ninja.    He is seen alongside his fellow village ninja aiding in the restoration of the village after Pain's invasion.

characters.name: Tekuno Kanden
characters.description: Tekuno Kanden (感電テクノ, Kanden Tekuno) is a shinobi of Konohagakure that protected its borders after the Invasion of Konoha.    Tekuno has a robust build and has shaggy brown hair. He wears the standard attire of a Konoha shinobi along with fingerless gloves. He also wears his flak jacket unzipped under which he wears a utility sash with his several scrolls.     His abilities primarily revolve around the use of heavy explosive artillery and is also highly skilled at setting traps. He was also very skilled at using wires, often incorporating them into his traps. He was so proficient with them that he is able to lay them all over the battlefield then manipulate them in such a way that he could trap multiple enemy in them at once. During a mission he was shown summoning a crossbow that he used to fire projectiles with exploding tags attached to them. Along with this weapon he also summoned a few katana, so it can be assumed that he is skilled at using them.     He was assigned to a squad along with Hayama Shirakumo, Kosuke Maruboshi and Naruto Uzumaki to protect the norther boundaries of the village after Suna and Otogakure's invasion of the village. During their mission he was assigned to set traps around the area. Not long after they were ambushed by a battalion of ninja from Iwagakure. Tekuno's traps proved useful in hindering the progress of the ninja but when they had breached these securities, he stayed behind to allow the other members of the squad time to escape and report to the village. He summoned a crossbow with explosive tags attached to the projectiles and along with Hayama wiped out the majority of the ninja. Together the team was able to wipe out dozens of Iwa ninja.    He was later seen helping to restore the village after Pain's Invasion bragging about his heroism on the mission.

characters.name: Fu Yamanaka
characters.description: Fu is a member in Root.  Manga Debut: Chapter #454 Anime: Naruto Shippūden Episode #198   ~!He is one of Danzo's chosen bodyguards.!~

characters.name: Hanare
characters.description: Hanare is a kunoichi from the Jōmae Village. She was an orphan who longed to see her parents and find a home she could call her own.    As a young child, Hanare was said to be very lonely since she never knew her family or seen her own village. She was trained from an early age in the art of espionage. One day, she was found crying in a place near her village by the young Kakashi, who spotted her and carried her on his back. He then explained to her that she can look up to the clouds above and find her way. They both then were seen by a ninja from Hanare's village and Kakashi put her down on her feet, said goodbye and left. She was then excited that someone like Kakashi was able to help her in her life.    Hanare's abilities allow her to read someone's mind by using her right eye to literally look into it. She is even able to use this ability on those who are looking at her thoughts. She can also erase all of her thoughts that she had gathered. To use this technique, she weaves signs by moving her eye in specific patterns. Hanare's special technique can help her in collecting and gathering information in various things.  She has also been trained to have an immensely strong will, unyielding to seemingly any form of torture, even by the likes of Ibiki Morino, a master manipulator of the human psyche.

characters.name: Nekomata
characters.description: Nekomata (猫又, Nekomata) is giant cat who is the boss of the ninja cat underworld.    Appearance: Konoha History Arc - Episode 189 (Filler Arc)    During Sasuke Uchiha's childhood, Itachi Uchiha made a game of collecting paw prints of quick, nimble cats from a normal cat to a lion and the last paw print to be collected was Nekomata's. Itachi once defeated Nekomata and his ninja cats and requested him to fight Sasuke with all his might when he gets older.    (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Fuguki Suikazan
characters.description: Fuguki Suikazan was a high-ranking shinobi of Kirigakure and a former member of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.  Manga Debut: Chapter #507  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #251  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Baji
characters.description: Baji was a leader of a group of bandits.     ~!He kidnapped the Headman's granddaughter and held her hostage. After Team 7 and Team 10 had infiltrated his fortress, he asked to make a hostage exchange between Tōfu and Shikamaru Nara. With the help of Chōji Akimichi and Ino Yamanaka, Shikamaru managed to gain the upper hand over him. Knowing there was no escape, he threatened to kill himself using Exploding Tags wrapped all over his body, but was stopped by Shikamaru's Shadow Imitation Technique. !~    Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #195    (source: http://naruto.wikia.com/wiki/Baji)

characters.name: Jakou
characters.description: Jakou is a thief that stole some treasure from a daimyō's sister.     ~!He, along with his group of bandits that were traveling with treasure stolen from the daimyō's sister. The treasure was later recovered by Naruto Uzumaki and Sasuke Uchiha, who later defeated him and his team. !~    Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #194

characters.name: Kisuke Maboroshi
characters.description: Kisuke Maboroshi (まぼろし奇介, Maboroshi Kisuke) was a member of Konohagakure's ANBU.     ~!The leaders of Konoha had suspicions that there was a spy within their midst and Kisuke was assigned with the task of finding out who that person was. His investigations led him to an upcoming shinobi, Sabiru. One night, he tracked down Sabiru in a forest, and after discovering he was the spy he engaged him in battle. After a short fight, Sabiru deceived him with a shadow clone and threw him in the river below. He managed to grab a rock, but Sabiru appeared on top of it, saying he had already killed his wife and burned down his house. He then proceeded to extract Kisuke's soul from his body, sealing it in a tag, which was left attached to the rock.    The tag was eventually found and accidentally removed by Naruto, resulting in Kisuke's soul appearing before him a short time later as a ghost, with no memories of his past life. After asking around Konoha, he and Naruto discovered Kisuke's comatose body in Konoha Hospital: the body was later killed by Sabiru, resulting in a second "death" for Kisuke. With Naruto's help, the now deceased ANBU found out the location of his home, which they found burned down. In this place, by seeing a tulip, Kisuke had his memory back, and revealed what had happened. With Naruto's and Kakashi's help, Kisuke managed to prevent Sabiru from operating his dangerous security project, which would have caused troubles to the village. By possessing Naruto's body and using his signature Shadow Clone Technique, he then proceeded to attack Sabiru. Before he could take revenge however, Kabuto Yakushi silently killed Sabiru from a distance, to prevent him from revealing anything.    In the end, he was able to find eternal rest and meet his loved wife again. As he disappeared, he asked Naruto to put some tulips on his and his wife's grave, thanked him for everything he had done to help him and encouraged him to live his life to the fullest.    Years later, Naruto finds Kisuke's photo with his wife and decides to put it along with tulips on the Memorial Stone thus fulfilling his promise. !~    Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #193    (source: http://naruto.wikia.com/wiki/Kisuke_Maboroshi)

characters.name: Naho
characters.description:
Naho (ナホ, Naho) is a relative of the Fire Daimyō.     ~!While she was playing with her ball, she dropped it and started rolling. She tried to catch it, but slipped off a cliff. Sasuke Uchiha managed to save her and like many before her, she also seems to have an infatuation with Sasuke. Naruto Uzumaki and Sakura Haruno were assigned by Tsunade to escort her to Shizume village. She rejected saying that she wanted Sasuke to be her bodyguard. They started their journey with Naruto transformed as Sasuke in order to fool her. They encountered an enemy with an impenetrable body. After a fight with the criminal and other ninja, the criminal quickly defeats Naruto and Sakura and captured the three. Later that night, Sasuke locates the three and battles the criminal. he eventually defeated him with Chidori but continued to beat him. Naho noted Sasuke's coldness and became scared of him, however Naruto said that she should forgive him because Sasuke is really a good person, and that he will bring him to her as soon as he becomes his former self. !~    Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #196

(Source: Naruto Fandom Wiki)

characters.name: Sabiru
characters.description: Sabiru (サビル, Sabiru) was a young high level shinobi in Konohagakure's tactical division. He was later discovered to be a traitor and a spy.      ~!Sabiru was part of Konohagakure's tactical and defence division during the Third Hokage's administration. He had seemingly come up with a plan that would fortify Konohagakure's defences so much that the Third stated that it would fortify the peace in Konohagakure forever. He however was discovered to be a traitor of the village by Kisuke Maboroshi, a member of the ANBU. When Kisuke confronted Sabiru, he removed Kisuke's soul essentially putting him into a comatose state. After murdering Kisuke by deactivating his life support system Naruto Uzumaki tried to expose him as a spy. Later with help from Kakashi Hatake he was found liable, but before they could extract any information from him he was taken out by a hidden Kabuto Yakushi. !~    Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #193    (source: http://naruto.wikia.com/wiki/Sabiru)

characters.name: Sadai
characters.description: Sadai (サダイ, Sadai) is an assailant who entered Land of Fire to capture Naho. He was on the national wanted list.      ~!Sadai and his group intercepted Naruto Uzumaki, Sakura Haruno and Naho. Naruto managed to defeat his comrades, but his Shadow Clone Techniques and Rasengan didn't work on him. After he captured the group, Sasuke Uchiha came and battled him. After discovering his taijutsu skills weren't enough, he used Fire Release: Great Fireball Technique to burn assailants armour, thus showing his true face. Sasuke defeated him using Chidori, and even after his defeat, Sasuke punched him severely because of his words about Itachi Uchiha and the Uchiha Clan Massacre and about weak Sasuke. Sasuke was only stopped by Kakashi, who reminded him that they should bring Sadai back for questioning. !~    Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #196    (source: http://naruto.wikia.com/wiki/Sadai)

characters.name: Suguro
characters.description: Suguro is a thief that was part of Jako's gang.      ~!He is the first of the thieves to find and attack Naruto Uzumaki and Sasuke Uchiha after they were linked together by Jako's Chakra Liquid technique, when Naruto wanted to pee and Sasuke refused to go with him (as they were both linked). They started arguing when they came across Suguro who was apparently himself peeing. He quickly dashed towards them and attacked them with his Manriki-gusari, but was later defeated by both of them. !~    Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #194    (source: http://naruto.wikia.com/wiki/Suguro)

characters.name: Toufu
characters.description: Tōfu (トウフウ, Toufuu) is a self-proclaimed ex-bandit.    ~!Although claiming to be an ex-bandit, he was actually a spy working for a gang leader, as his double agent in the village. His major work involved gathering information. He was arrested by a Konohagakure joint team after the gang was defeated. !~  Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #195  (source: http://naruto.wikia.com/wiki/Tofu)

characters.name: Muta Aburame
characters.description: Muta had long brown hair and like all other Aburame, his eyes were obscured by dark sunglasses. His attire consisted of a long sleeved light tan jacket with a high, upturned collar. The remainder of his form was largely obstructed by the low hemlines and overlaying clothes. He also had a pouch fastened to the back of his outfit which he used to carry around a jar in which he carried additional Kikaichū bugs.

characters.name: Land of Fire Daimyo
characters.description: The Fire Daimyō has a fickle and indecisive nature and is easily swayed in his decisions through biases as well as external influences. When situations call for fast, important decisions, he makes his advisers do the whole work: the one who convinces him most is the "winner". He seemingly had a liking for Jiraiya, wanting to choose him as the next Hokage, and was also impressed by Kakashi Hatake's reputation.     (Source: Naruto.wikia)

characters.name: Gerotora
characters.description: Gerotora is a scroll toad, a rare species that closely guards whatever secret has been written on its scroll-abdomen until his contractor dies. He resides in the belly of his contractor, and is known for his excellent endurance.     (Source: Naruto.wikia)

characters.name: Yuusuke
characters.description: Yuusuke (ユウスケ, Yūsuke) is a fisherman in the Land of Fire. When he was a child, he and his father tried to catch a giant summoned marlin, they failed, resulting in his father's death. Yuusuke became determined to avenge his father by catching the marlin.

characters.name: Ship's Captain
characters.description: Captain of the ship in which Hishaku was part of.  (episode 225)

characters.name: Honoka
characters.description: A kunoichi working with the researchers on a remote island.While researchers worked on the Ultimate Summoning Animal, Honoka was assigned to restrain the beast using her sealing techniques. However, at some point in time the beast got too powerful for her technique to restrain it and killed everyone. Honoka had dark eyes and long red hair in which she wore a white band. She wore a purple, sleeveless kimono blouse with yellow trimmings held close by a traditional obi with a long, streaming bow tied to it, mesh armour underneath it and a short white skirt. She seemed to prefer going barefoot. Honoka had some aptitude for sealing techniques as she was assigned to restrain the Ultimate Summoning Animal. She could use a sealing technique that caused the sealing formula to form into chains to restrain a target.

characters.name: Hibachi
characters.description: Hibachi was a student at the Ninja Academy, assigned to Iruka Umino's class.  Hibachi picked on Naruto when he failed to perform the Clone Technique but was stopped by Iruka, saying not to bother with a kid like him.   (Source: naruto.wikia (Narutopedia))

characters.name: Igii
characters.description: Appears in episode 233.

characters.name: Banna
characters.description: Appears in episode 233.

characters.name: Suika
characters.description: A jōnin of Takigakure prior to his defection from the village. He afterwards operated as a bandit.   Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #236

characters.name: Shizuka
characters.description: A kunoichi and future leader of the Nadeshiko Village. She was destined to marry a student of Jiraiya that can defeat her, because of a law from her village.  Shizuka is a highly capable and powerful kunoichi. She has shown great weapons proficiency, incorporating kunai into her techniques such as the Nadeshiko-Style Deep Crimson Dance Performance, a technique that Tokiwa praised Naruto for being able to dodge as well as the Dance Performance: Second Step where she spins in the air while releasing a volley of kunai at the enemy, greatly increasing her range.  #Anime debut: Naruto: Shippuuden Episode #235

characters.name: Tokiwa
characters.description: Tokiwa (トキワ, Tokiwa) is a kunoichi from the Nadeshiko Village.  Anime debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #235

characters.name: Kokuyou
characters.description: Appears in episode 235.

characters.name: Nadeshiko Previous Leader
characters.description: Former leader of the Nadeshiko Village. Decades ago she encountered Jiraiya who has entered her village to do "research" for his next novel. After he escaped she pursued him and challenged him to a duel for his hand in marriage. This match was however postponed, as neither party was making headway against the other. Jiraiya promised that their students instead should one day seek each other out and fight if the two never met again. This promise fell to her pupil Shizuka and Jiraiya's last pupil Naruto Uzumaki.   She's presumed to be Shizuka's mother but is not confirmed neither named as such in the credits, instead she's named as "Previous Head of the village (先代里長)".  Appears in episode 235.  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Madara Uchiha
characters.description:
__Classification:__ Missing-nin  
__Occupation:__ Co-founder of Konohagakure, Leader of the Uchiha clan  
__Affiliation:__ Konohagakure  
__Clan:__ Uchiha clan  
__Manga Debut:__ Chapter #370  
__Anime Debut:__ Naruto Shippūden Episode #130  

Madara Uchiha (うちはマダラ, Uchiha Madara) was a legendary ninja who led the Uchiha clan prior to and after the formation of Konohagakure.  Before the era of ninja villages, Madara and his younger brother, Izuna, were considered the most gifted members of the Uchiha clan. Even by his clan's standards, Madara's chakra was especially strong. He grew up constantly competing and training with Izuna and in their efforts to surpass each other, each gained their own Mangekyō Sharingan. With the power of the Mangekyō the two brothers took control of the clan, with Madara as its leader. Under his leadership, the clan conquered all they came across. Because of the never-ending series of battles of the time, Madara eventually began to suffer from overuse of the Mangekyō Sharingan, leaving him blind. In order to regain his sight he took Izuna's eyes for himself, granting him an "eternal" Mangekyō Sharingan with which he led the Uchiha clan to prosperity.  Over the years, the Uchiha had constantly fought with the equally powerful Senju clan and as such, Madara had an undying rivalry with Hashirama Senju, the leader of the Senju clan. To bring an end to the constant fighting, Hashirama approached the Uchiha with an offer of peace. Although Madara never wanted peace with the Senju, the rest of the Uchiha wished to end the fighting, and Madara had no choice but to accept. The Senju, the Uchiha, and all the clans they had conquered came together to form the village of Konohagakure.  Some time later, the villagers of Konoha selected Hashirama as the village's first Hokage much to Madara's dismay. Madara feared that Hashirama would oppress the Uchiha, and tried to rally support for challenging his leadership. Rather than help him, the Uchiha turned their backs on him, believing he only desired to rekindle the flames of war.  Soon after being rejected the position of Hokage and being abandoned by his clan, Madara left the village, and sought out Nine-Tails. He later returned in order to challenge Hashirama in battle. They fought at the site that would someday be called the Valley of the End, where Madara was defeated, despite having Nine-Tails at his side. Control of Nine-Tails was ultimately taken from him and Madara was believed to have died.   ~!During the Fourth Shinobi World War, after Nagato is sealed by the recently freed Uchiha Itachi, Kabuto uses his 'trump card' by having Mū use the Impure World Resurrection to summon the 'real' Uchiha Madara (then-proving that Tobi is merely using the his namesake, and that he is in fact not Madara). After being resurrected, Madara also shows his ability to utilize not only his Sharingan and Mangekyou Sharingan abilities, but also those of the Rinnegan and Wood Jutsu.!~

characters.name: Motoi
characters.description: Motoi (モトイ, Motoi) is a Kumogakure shinobi who is stationed on the Island Turtle.   Manga debut: Chapter #492  Anime debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #243   When Motoi was five-years-old, he and Killer B were good friends. After Motoi's father was killed during an attempt to subdue the Eight-Tails that had broken free from its previous jinchūriki, Motoi came to hate the Eight-Tails. B was soon chosen to be the beast's next jinchūriki and Motoi, just as many other Kumo villagers did, focused his anger towards B because he was to be the vessel of the beast. He once tried to assassinate B to avenge his father, but was disarmed by B easily. Despite having his face covered, Motoi assumed that B knew it was him, as B ungrudgingly greeted him as they used to with a fist bump. After this, Motoi could never bring himself to face B, and hadn't spoken to him for thirty years, but in time he came to admire B as a village hero.

characters.name: Gyuuki
characters.description: The Eight-Tails is a tailed beast sealed within Killer B of Kumogakure after his cousin, cousin's uncle and cousin's father failed before him.   Since Killer B is one of the few jinchūriki to gain control over his tailed beast, his relationship with the Eight-Tails is very relaxed. Where the Nine-Tailed Demon Fox constantly threatens its jinchūriki and must be either restrained or confined to be spoken to, B and the Eight-Tails can talk leisurely, with Killer B even sitting on its nose. However, B tends to annoy the Eight-Tails to comical effect; his serious and no-nonsense demeanour often contrasts with B's tendency to goof off whenever he likes, adding fuel to the Tailed Beast's irritation to his vessel. The Eight-Tails is not above bad-mouthing B as a result. The Eight-Tails is also known to scold him in serious occasions as shown when it criticised B for rapping in his fight with Kisame when he should have been completely focused on their opponent. Because of this, the Eight-Tails appears to be much more note worthy than B as far as responsibility is concerned. Before B learned to control it, the Eight-Tails was infamous to be wild, and violent. It also went on many rampages whenever its former jinchūriki would lose control of it.   Despite the Eight-Tails' strong relationship with Killer B, its main goal, like the other beasts, is self preservation. For example, it was more than willing to be released and attack Kisame Hoshigaki despite Sabu and Ponta being close by. The Eight-Tails is also shown to have a good analytical ability, as it told Killer B that if he left Ponta and Sabu and run in the opposite direction Kisame and the water will follow him and they (Sabu and Ponta) would be freed. The Eight-Tails mentioned that it used to be much more aggressive and violent but that Killer B changed it. It also said that it doesn't like the Nine-Tails but insisted that was no reason for B to refuse to help Naruto take control of the beast, hinting a benevolent side. Since then, both the beast and B have taken a liking to Naruto. The Eight-Tails also tends to reprimand B. This is usually shown in a comical manner as when it bumped B in the head when the latter started to mention in a perverted matter how Yugito's chakra receivers where embedded in her left breast.   With regards to its relationship with the other tailed beasts, the Eight-Tails maintaining that they had their own emotions and personalities has expressed dislike of the Nine-Tails' habit of ranking their strength based on their number of tails and has also stated that seeing another beast being forcefully controlled angered the rest of them greatly.

characters.name: Taji
characters.description: Taji (タジ, Taji) was a Konoha ANBU and medical-nin of Konohagakure.  Manga Debut: Chapter #500 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #247  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Mito Uzumaki
characters.description: A kunoichi who originated from Uzushiogakure's Uzumaki clan and later married into Konohagakure's Senju clan. She was also the first jinchūriki of Kurama the Nine-Tailed Demon Fox.

characters.name: Biwako Sarutobi
characters.description: Biwako Sarutobi (猿飛ビワコ, Sarutobi Biwako) was the wife of Hiruzen Sarutobi.   Manga Debut: Chapter #500 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #247  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Kurenai no Chichi
characters.description: Kurenai's father, he is a shinobi from Konohagakure.  Manga Debut: Chapter #503 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #248  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Iruka no Chichi
characters.description: Iruka's father, he was a Konohagakure shinobi.  Manga Debut: Chapter #503 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #177  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Iruka no Haha
characters.description: Iruka's mother, she was a kunoichi from Konohagakure.  Manga Debut: Chapter #503 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #177  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Hagoromo Ootsutsuki
characters.description: The Sage of the Six Paths (六道仙人, Rikudō Sennin) was the legendary figure who founded the arts of ninjutsu and created the ninja world. He defeated the Ten-Tails and sealed it within his own body, thus becoming the first jinchūriki.

characters.name: Tenga
characters.description: Tenga (天画, Tenga) is a shinobi of Kumogakure.  Manga Debut: Chapter #488 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #218

characters.name: Ranka
characters.description: Ranka (ランカ, Ranka; Viz "Lanka") is a ninja from Konohagakure.  Manga Debut: Chapter #489 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #197

characters.name: Tokuma Hyuuga
characters.description: Tokuma Hyuuga is a shinobi from Konohagakure's Hyūga clan.  Manga Debut: Chapter #489 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #197

characters.name: Gari
characters.description: Gari (ガリ, Gari) was a famed Iwagakure shinobi and a member of the Explosion Corps along with Deidara.  Gari is able to use Explosion Release, a kekkei genkai that allows him to combine two unknown chakra natures to utilise explosive chakra, as seen when he used Explosion Release: Landmine Fist to obliterate an Allied Shinobi ninja simply by punching him.  Manga Debut: Chapter #515 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #256  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Chuukichi
characters.description: Chuukichi (中吉, Chūkichi) was a famed Kirigakure shinobi.  He was a well noted shinobi during his lifetime, enough to justify his inclusion as a sensor and a backup within Akatsuki's Surprise Attack and Diversion Platoon, alongside Deidara, Sasori and Shin.  Manga Debut: Chapter #516 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #261  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Ganryuu
characters.description: Ganryuu (巌流, Ganryū) is a jōnin-level shinobi of Kirigakure.  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #242  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Hoheto Hyuuga
characters.description: Hoheto Hyuuga (日向ホヘト, Hyūga Hoheto) is a shinobi from Konohagakure's Hyūga clan.  Manga Debut: Chapter #515 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #256  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Ittan
characters.description: Ittan (イッタン, Ittan) is an Iwagakure shinobi.  Manga Debut: Chapter #515 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #256  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Kiri
characters.description: Kiri (キリ, Kiri) is a medical-nin from Kirigakure.  Manga Debut: Chapter #515 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #242  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Kitsuchi
characters.description: Kitsuchi (黄ツチ, Kitsuchi) is a shinobi from Iwagakure.  Manga Debut: Chapter #515 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #256  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Tango
characters.description:
__Manga Debut:__ Chapter #515  
__Anime Debut:__ Naruto Shippūden Episode #261

Tango is a Kumogakure shinobi.

characters.name: Yukata
characters.description: Yukata (ユカタ, Yukata) is a young kunoichi from Sunagakure.  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #261  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Zaji
characters.description: Zaji (ザジ, Zaji) is a shinobi from Konohagakure.  Manga Debut: Chapter #515 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #256  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Pakura
characters.description:
Manga Debut: Chapter #516  
Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #261  

Pakura was a famed Sunagakure kunoichi during her lifetime.  She possesses a kekkei genkai known as Scorch Release. By combining two unknown chakra natures, she can create heat orbs that "mummify" her enemies, killing them seemingly by evaporating all the moisture in their bodies. Pakura displays this ability when using Scorch Release: Extremely Steaming Murder; combined with her incredible agility, she managed to kill many Allied Shinobi Forces members in a short amount of time.  

(Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Gatou
characters.description:
Gatou was a shipping magnate and founder of Gatō Company. He also was secretly a drug dealer as well as the owner of a smuggling business and attempted to take control of the Land of Waves.  Manga Debut: Chapter #10  Anime Debut: Naruto  Episode #6  

(Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Iwa Kakure no Jounin
characters.description: Appears in Naruto Shippuuden Episode #190.  An Iwagakure kunoichi that led a battalion of Iwagakure ninja to attack Konohagakure's border after its invasion by Sunagakure and Otogakure.  She is shown to be very cruel as she sacrificed many Iwagakure genin during her fight with Kosuke Maruboshi. She also has a liking of cutting her opponents into pieces.  She has long brown-coloured hair which she ties in such a fashion as to form a ball on top of her head, using what appears to be a knitting-needle, while two large locks with darkened tips frame the remainder of her face. Her typical attire is similar to Ino Yamanaka's in that it consists of a short sleeveless dress, further adorned by the presence of numerous bandages that encircle various portions of her body, including her waist and thighs.   ~!She was defeated when Kosuke used his Water Release: Water Dragon Bullet Technique to overpower her Earth Release: Earth and Stone Dragon.!~

characters.name: Suiren
characters.description: Suiren (スイレン, Suiren) was a kunoichi of Kirigakure.  Ten years prior to the formation of the Allied Shinobi Forces, Suiren was part of Ganryū's team that was tasked with retrieving a scroll along with a team from Iwagakure taken by Kumogakure shinobi. After retrieving the document, Suiren was excited for the prospects of peace that a mission like this would bring. She was however wrong as Iwagakure betrayed them. After Junsai was killed, Suiren sacrificed herself in order to protect Ganryū. This incident which come to be known as the Tragedy of Yosuga Pass marked the begining of hostility between Kirigakure and Iwagakure.  Suiren was a kind and loving person who dearly held onto the ideals of peace. After their mission was seemingly completed she spoke openly of what an alliance like this between Kirigakure and Iwagakure would mean for the shinobi world.  She was a very beautiful kunoichi with brown eyes and long blonde hair with two strands framing her face. She wore a pair of earrings along with the standard attire of the Kirigakure-nin complete with forehead protector and flak jacket, along with the jade-green bangle that was worn by her team.  Source: http://naruto.wikia.com/wiki/Suiren

characters.name: Maki
characters.description: Maki (マキ, Maki) is a kunoichi from Sunagakure.  Manga Debut: Chapter #270  Anime: Naruto Shippūden Episode #12  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Ensui Nara
characters.description: Ensui Nara is a member of Konohagakure's Nara clan.  Manga Debut: Chapter #523 Anime: Naruto Shippūden Episode #266  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Santa Yamanaka
characters.description: Santa Yamanaka is a shinobi from Konohagakure's Yamanaka clan.  Manga Debut: Chapter #523 Anime: Naruto Shippūden Episode #266  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Muu
characters.description: Muu (無, Mū) was the Second Tsuchikage (二代目土影, Nidaime Tsuchikage; Literally meaning "Second Earth Shadow") of Iwagakure.  Mū is capable of becoming perfectly camouflaged with the surrounding environment. His camouflage is so good that he has become renowned as the "Non-Person" (無人, Mujin), a title which he gained for seemingly having neither form nor chakra, while the technique was active. It is impossible to detect him by normal means and so, Mū considers anyone with the ability to sense his presence worthy of praise.  Mū is one of the few people capable of using a kekkei tōta, an advanced and extremely powerful form of kekkei genkai. In particular, he possesses the Dust Release, which allows him to combine the fire, earth and wind natures to reduce his opponents to nothing more than mere dust, destroying them down to even a molecular level. Compared with fellow dust-user, Ōnoki, his power is implied to be on equal terms, as when the two initiated Dust Release: Detachment of the Primitive World Technique, the disastrous outcome although chaotic, demonstrated no evident victor in regards to strength. This may be due to the fact that Mū's power hadn't waned since his lifetime, a fact later affirmed by Ōnoki.  Manga Debut: Chapter #515 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #256  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Kushimaru Kuriarare
characters.description: Kushimaru Kuriarare was one of the former members of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist and Kirigakure's ANBU.  Kushimaru possessed the unique longsword Nuibari. With it, he was not only able to precisely pierce multiple enemies in quick succession, but also stitch them together utilising a substantial length of wire attached to the blade. This aptly demonstrated his proficient dexterity while handling this particular needle-like sword, as he was able to repeatedly catch it securely just mere moments after previously forcing the blade through his adversaries.  Manga Debut: Chapter #522 Anime: Naruto Shippūden Episode #265  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Jinpachi Munashi
characters.description: Jinpachi Munashi was a former member of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist of Kirigakure.  Utilising the unique "explosion" sword Shibuki, Jinpachi intuitively combined expert swordsmanship with destructive explosions, due to the significant quantity of explosive tags incorporated into the platform-like edge. Once these tags detonate an integrated scroll deposits another set along the same edge, allowing the sword to be used consecutively. However, the capabilities of this weapon do not come without risk, as the user themselves can potentially be caught in the resultant blast but Jinpachi's skill is such that this does not occur.  Manga Debut: Chapter #522 Anime: Naruto Shippūden Episode #265  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Ameyuri Ringo
characters.description:
__Height:__ 143.5 cm (4'9")

One of the former members of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.

Ameyuri was very skilled at utilising the Kiba, twin swords imbued with lightning, which are claimed to be the sharpest sword that were made, having the ability to cut through anything, by apparently functioning in a similar manner to Lightning Release-based chakra flow which she wielded with great dexterity. In the anime, it was shown that she uses the Kiba in combination with agile spinning movements, sweeping through her targets while rotating around herself, hitting all enemies around her.

characters.name: Third Raikage
characters.description: The Third Raikage (三代目雷影, Sandaime Raikage; Literally meaning "Third Lightning Shadow") was the leader of Kumogakure thirty years prior to the Fourth Shinobi World War.  Manga Debut: Chapter #494 Anime: Naruto Shippūden Episode #244  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Gengetsu Hoozuki
characters.description:
__Manga Debut:__ Chapter #525 
__Anime:__ Naruto Shippūden Episode #267

The Second Mizukage was the leader of Kirigakure and a member of the Hoozuki clan.

characters.name: Kinkaku
characters.description: Kinkaku (金角, Kinkaku) is one of Kumogakure's infamous Gold and Silver Brothers alongside his brother Ginkaku.  Manga Debut: Chapter #525 Anime: Naruto Shippūden Episode #267  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Ginkaku
characters.description: Ginkaku (銀角, Ginkaku) is one of Kumogakure's infamous Gold and Silver Brothers alongside his brother Kinkaku.  Manga Debut: Chapter #525 Anime: Naruto Shippūden Episode #267  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Atsui
characters.description: He is a shinobi from Kumogakure. In stark contrast to his sister Samui, Atsui has a rather hot-headed and spirited attitude, which is evident even in battle. He prefers attacking his enemies head on, leaving him entirely devoid of any support at times. He has a tendency of saying the word "hot" (あつい, atsui) and admits that he has created a substantial amount of "hot-shot" catchphrases. Like many other Kumogakure shinobi, Atsui is extremely proficient in kenjutsu, incorporating a long white katana as part of his main fighting style. When this blade is utilised in conjunction with his Fire Release nature transformation techniques, through the application of Chakra Flow, he is capable of incinerating a significant quantity of opponents in a single instant. The anime also showed that he is able to conjure flames with each swing of his sword.

characters.name: Land of Wind Daimyo
characters.description: He is the current daimyō of the Land of Wind, replacing the former wind daimyō. During a meeting of the Five Great Shinobi Countries' daimyō he was the third daimyō out of the five, who consented to allow the Allied Shinobi Forces to officially form, being wary of "Madara Uchiha"'s position as the leader of Akatsuki.

characters.name: Land of Earth Daimyo
characters.description: He appears to have an impatient attitude, as seen when he and the other daimyō awaited the response of the uncertain Water Daimyō. He prompted him to respond quickly due to the urgency of the impending war.

characters.name: Land of Frost Daimyo
characters.description: He is an elderly man with short, pale purple hair that spikes up at the back, a bristling moustache and a long beard. He wears a hat of sorts which has the symbol of his village on it, similar to a forehead protector. He also squints and wears what appears to be a purple kimono.

characters.name: Land of Lightning Daimyo
characters.description: He is the daimyō of the Land of Lightning.  During a meeting of the Five Great Shinobi Countries' daimyō, he agreed to the creation of the Allied Shinobi Forces. In the anime, he was requested to convene a Daimyō Summit by the Fourth Raikage.  Manga Debut: Chapter #488  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #217  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Land of Water Daimyo
characters.description: He is the daimyō of the Land of Water.  During a meeting of the Five Great Shinobi Countries' daimyō he was cautious that the alliance would give shinobi too much power. This prompted the Earth Daimyō to suggest he didn't trust the ninja of his country. He eventually gave his consent to the formation of the alliance, albeit reluctantly.  Manga Debut: Chapter #488  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #218  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Okisuke
characters.description: Okisuke (オキスケ, Okisuke) is a samurai from the Land of Iron and one of Mifune's right-hand-man alongside Urakaku.  Manga Debut: Chapter #456 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #199  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Kizashi Haruno
characters.description: Kizashi Haruno (春野キザシ, Haruno Kizashi) is a shinobi of Konohagakure and the husband of Mebuki and father of Sakura Haruno.  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #271 Movie Debut: Naruto: Shippuuden Movie 6 - Road to Ninja  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Mebuki Haruno
characters.description: Mebuki Haruno (春野メブキ, Haruno Mebuki) is a kunoichi of Konohagakure and the wife of Kizashi and mother of Sakura Haruno.  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #271 Movie Debut: Naruto: Shippuuden Movie 6 - Road to Ninja  (source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Condor
characters.description: He is an average sized ostrich who wears three pink bows on his neck.  a runaway pet that Team 7 was tasked with retrieving but later became a member of the Four Ninja Animal Warriors.

characters.name: Ran
characters.description: Ran has a short crop of brown hair and blue eyes. She wore a midriff blouse and a skirt along with a customised midriff Kumogakure flak jacket. She also wore red wrist warmers, stockings and a pair of sandals with the forehead protector of the Allied Shinobi Forces.

characters.name: Fukai
characters.description: A's cousin. He was a high-ranking Kumogakure shinobi as well as the predecessor of Killer B as the jinchuuriki of Gyuuki, the Eight-Tails.  Manga Debut: Chapter #494  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #244  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Chouji no Haha
characters.description: She is a citizen of Konohagakure, the mother of Chouji Akimichi, and the wife of Chouza Akimichi. She is also a member of the Allied Mothers Force.   Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #82  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Dodai
characters.description: Dodai (ドダイ, Dodai) is a Kumogakure shinobi.  Manga Debut: Chapter #541  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #282  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Ino no Haha
characters.description: She is a citizen of Konohagakure, the wife of Inoichi Yamanaka, and mother of Ino Yamanaka. She is also a member of the Allied Mothers Force.  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #281  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Urakaku
characters.description: Urakaku (ウラカク, Urakaku) is a samurai from the Land of Iron and one of Mifune's right-hand-man alongside Okisuke.  Manga Debut: Chapter #456 Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #199  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Watase
characters.description: Watase (ワタセ, Watase) is a genin-level shinobi from Konohagakure.  Manga Debut: Chapter #494  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippuuden Episode #244  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Gamahiro
characters.description: Gamahiro is a giant toad that resides on Mount Myoboku. He sometimes called: "Hiro".  When Gamahiro first appears in the anime, his skin is colored green and brown. This is updated to a light-blue-greenish color for the Invasion of Pain Arc, keeping up with the manga's coloration.  Though he was first summoned in part I, he was not named until he was summoned again in part II.   Though Gamahiro has spoken in the anime, he has yet to do so in the manga.

characters.name: Aoda
characters.description:
Species: Snake
Classification: Summon
Affiliation: Ryuuchi Cave

Aoda is an inhabitant of the Ryuuchi Cave and the personal summon of Sasuke Uchiha.

In stark contrast to Manda, a snake of similar size to it, Aoda seems to be very mild mannered and respectful to its summoner, as shown when it addresses Sasuke with the "-sama" suffix and dutifully follows all his orders without needing to be controlled. Aoda also asked Sasuke how he could be of service the instant he was summoned. He was also described as simple.

characters.name: Yota
characters.description: Yota was born on a unknown date into a poor walking traveling unknown named clan who could manipulate weather, and use their skills to make a living. Five years before the start of the series, Yota died at a young age of natural causes due to his frailty yet weak body. But he was later on reincarnated by Orochimaru as a test subject for or in his research on Impure World Reincarnation.

characters.name: Kaguya Ootsutsuki
characters.description:
__Race:__ Celestial Being

Kaguya Ootsutsuki  was the matriarch of an Ootsutsuki clan branch family and mother of Hagoromo and Hamura. Long before the founding of the hidden villages, during an era of endless war, Kaguya consumed the fruit of the God Tree and became the first wielder of chakra on Earth, before later merging with the tree to become the Ten-Tails.

characters.name: Duy Might
characters.description:
__Ninja Rank:__ Genin

Guy's father.

characters.name: Hamura Ootsutsuki
characters.description: Hamura Ootsutsuki is the son of Princess Kaguya‎‎ Ootsutsuki, the fraternal twin brother of Hagoromo; both of whom were the first people born with the ability to wield chakra. Hamura was the ancestor of the Hyuuga clan and the founder of the shinobi of the Moon.

characters.name: Tonton
characters.description:
Tonton is Tsunade's ninja pig, often kept in the care of Shizune. She is always seen wearing a pearl collar and a dark red jacket. 

Tonton's sense of smell is noted to be even finer than that of a ninja dog. She has reportedly smelled debt collectors coming and saved Tsunade from them countless time. She was also able to direct Shizune, Jiraiya, and Naruto to Tsunade's location after she was locked in battle. Also, despite her small size, she is strong enough to carry several crates at least as large as her.

In the anime, Tonton once performed a Transformation Technique to appear as Tsunade. However, while doing so, she was still unable to speak.

characters.name: Indra Ootsutsuki
characters.description: Indra Ootsutsuki‎ was the first born son of Hagoromo Ootsutsuki. He was initially thought to be the most suitable successor of his father's teachings, however, it was his younger brother Asura that ended up inheriting this mantle — a decision that would lead the two brothers to fight against each other. Indra is also credited with being the creator of ninjutsu, and the progenitor of the Uchiha clan.

characters.name: Izumi Uchiha
characters.description: Izumi Uchiha was a kunoichi from Konohagakure and a member of the Uchiha Clan. She was a friend of Itachi Uchiha since their childhood and deeply cared about him, being so close to him as to be seen as his lover.

characters.name: Shukaku
characters.description: Shukakku is the demon that is in Gaara giving him most of his power AND his insanity. Shukakku is able to fire off sand chunks that look like and act like kunai. In the English dub, Shukakku is made sounding like an insane cowboy.    Shukkaku is the Ichibi, which is the One-Tail Jinchuriki. Shukkaku is very powerful as Gaara can still not fully control him.

characters.name: Hanabi Hyuuga
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Konoha
__Height:__ 132cm (4'4") - 170cm (5'6")

Hanabi (meaning "fireworks") is Hinata's sister and the youngest daughter of the leader of the Hyūga clan, Hiashi Hyūga.  She initially​ demonstrated more talent than Hinata at a young age, which led Hiashi to focus more attention on her training to rear her into the next heir of the clan.

~!Years later she leads Team 15, retaining her father's strict training and disciplining as her team's Jōnin. Despite this she shows a laidback attitude with her Genin while off duty and often dotes on her nephew, Boruto, and her niece, Himawari.!~

characters.name: Yashamaru
characters.description:
~!Yashamaru was a medic-nin, the younger brother of Karura, and thus the uncle of Gaara. At first, Gaara thought that he was the only one that cared about him. Yashamaru taught Gaara about physical pain, emotional pain and love; concepts Gaara was completely unaware of in his childhood. He was commanded by the Fourth Kazekage to assassinate Gaara, but was given the choice in deciding whether he wanted to proceed or not. Yashamaru willingly accepted the command in order to avenge his older sister's premature death. The assassination attempt, however, ended in a desperate suicide mission and ultimately failed. Before he died, he told Gaara that no one had ever really loved him, not even him. This left Gaara even more of an emotional wreck than he already was. His suicide bombing attempt on Gaara's life caused Gaara to become somewhat psychotic. Yashamaru's last words, to Gaara, were "This is it. Please die."  !~

(Source: NarutoWiki)

characters.name: Izuna Uchiha
characters.description: Izuna Uchiha is Madara Uchiha's younger brother. He was alive about 70 years before the start of the series, even before the founding of Konoha. Standing at the top of the Uchiha clan with his brother, Izuna was one of the first to obtain the elusive "Mangekyou Sharingan" (along with Madara). However, Madara went blind due to the use of his. To alleviate this, Izuna gave up his eyes so that Madara would obtain a new, 'permanent' Mangekyou.

characters.name: Fugaku Uchiha
characters.description: Fugaku was the leader of the Konoha Military Police Force, the father of Itachi and Sasuke Uchiha, and leader of the Uchiha clan. His wife's name was Mikoto Uchiha.    As leader of the Uchiha, Fugaku was focused on the clan's interest and welfare. His son, Sasuke, saw him as a stern and uncaring man (though his wife revealed he cared deeply for his youngest child) while he was seen as a father figure to the rest of the clan. As Itachi was his successor as head of the clan, Fugaku spent much of his time focusing on the development of his eldest and little time with his youngest. Sasuke trained constantly in order to get his father's attention and approval. Near the end of his life, Fugaku had switched his attention to Sasuke, having lost hope in a wayward Itachi. He is only impressed by great feats and rarely praises anyone, having high expectations. Fugaku is very serious, hardly smiling most of the time.

characters.name: Mubi
characters.description: Mubi is a genin from Amegakure.

characters.name: Oboro
characters.description: A genin from Hidden Rain, Oboro specializes in genjutsu along with his teammates Mubi and Kagari. They are bested by Naruto in the Forest of Death and lose their scroll.

characters.name: Tekka Uchiha
characters.description: Tekka Uchiha was a member of the Konoha Military Police. He questioned Itachi about the apparent suicide of Shisui Uchiha with Inabi Uchiha and Yashiro Uchiha. He was killed by Itachi along with the rest of the Uchiha clan.    (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Inabi Uchiha
characters.description: Inabi Uchiha was a policeman of the Konoha Military Police and a member of the Uchiha clan.

characters.name: Yashiro Uchiha
characters.description:
Yashiro Uchiha is the only known member of the Uchiha clan whose hair is not visually black. Despite his old age, Yashiro is one of the top-ranked officers in the Konoha Police Force. It has been seen through flashbacks in the anime that he did not get along well with Itachi. Some of the reasons are that he thought Itachi was a show-off and had an easy time getting into ANBU.    

(Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Kagari
characters.description:
Kagari (篝) is a Genin from Amegakure.   

 (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Fuu
characters.description: Fuu (フウ) was a kunoichi from Takigakure and the jinchuuriki of Choumei, the Seven-Tails. Choumei has been captured and sealed by Akatsuki, causing her death when the beast was extracted.   ~!Upon her reincarnation, Choumei appears to have been resealed within Fuu.!~  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Roushi
characters.description: Rōshi became the Jinchūriki the Four-Tailed Beast at a very young age. He left his hometown of Iwagakure at some point to understand and control the power of the beast within him. By borrowing the Four-Tails' power, Rōshi was able to use its Lava Release ninjutsu, a combination of Fire and Earth-based chakra. He was captured by Kisame Hoshigaki of Akatsuki and later died as the result of having the Four-Tails extracted from his body.

characters.name: Han
characters.description: Han was a shinobi from Iwagakure and was the host of the Five-Tailed Beast, as well as the physically largest jinchūriki, easily standing a head taller than Kirābī. The Five-Tails has been captured and sealed by Akatsuki, causing this jinchūriki's death when the beast was extracted. Another jinchūriki, named Rōshi, who held the Four-Tailed Beast, also originated from Iwagakure. It is logical to assume that he and Rōshi knew each other as they were both jinchūriki of the same village.

characters.name: Ukon
characters.description: Ukon is the twin brother of Sakon. He usually resides in Sakon's body (where he's said to be sleeping), with only his head protruding on Sakon's back. Ukon, unlike his brother, is very impatient and prefers to finish a fight quickly.

characters.name: Matatabi
characters.description: Matatabi (又旅, Matatabi), more commonly known as the Two-Tails (ニ尾, Nibi), is a tailed beast sealed within Yugito Nii of Kumogakure. It has been captured by Hidan and Kakuzu, then extracted and sealed by Akatsuki.

characters.name: Isobu
characters.description: Isobu (磯撫, Isobu), more commonly known as the Three-Tails (三尾, Sanbi), is a tailed beast that was formerly sealed in Yagura of Kirigakure. It has been captured by Deidara and Tobi, then sealed by Akatsuki.

characters.name: Saiken
characters.description: Saiken (犀犬, Saiken), more commonly known as the Six-Tails (六尾, Rokubi), is a tailed beast sealed within Utakata of Kirigakure. It has been captured by Pain in the anime, then extracted and sealed by Akatsuki.

characters.name: Son Goku
characters.description: Son Gokū (孫悟空, Son Gokū), more commonly known as the Four-Tails (四尾, Yonbi), is a tailed beast sealed within Rōshi of Iwagakure. It was captured by Kisame Hoshigaki, then extracted and sealed by Akatsuki.

characters.name: Kokuou
characters.description: Kokuō (穆王, Kokuō), more commonly known as the Five-Tails (五尾, Gobi), is a tailed beast sealed within Han from Iwagakure. It has been captured, extracted, and sealed by Akatsuki. In the anime, Kokuō is indicated to have been one of the two tailed beasts that Akatsuki captured before the start of Part II.

characters.name: Choumei
characters.description: Choumei (重明, Choumei), more commonly known as the Seven-Tails (七尾, Nanabi), is a tailed beast sealed within Fuu from Takigakure. It has been captured, extracted, and sealed by Akatsuki. In the anime, Choumei is indicated to have been one of the two tailed beasts that Akatsuki captured before the start of Part II.

characters.name: Jinin Akebino
characters.description: Jinin Akebino was one of the former members of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.  He was evidently very skilled at utilising Kabutowari, a blunt sword that consists of a single sided axe and a hammer joined by a leather strap, which is said to be capable of breaking through any defence. This is achieved by first striking with the axe, before hammering it through the remainder of the obstruction with the hammer, resulting in the axe functioning much like a wedge. The 'swords' construction still allows the weapons to retain their individual capabilities and thanks to Jinin's expertise, both the axe and the hammer can be exploited to their fullest.  Manga Debut: Chapter #522 Anime: Naruto Shippūden Episode #265  (Source: Narutopedia)

characters.name: Nonou Yakushi
characters.description: An ex member of Konoha's Anbu sub-division Root. She was an expert in the area of intelligence gathering, but left the organisation to run Konoha's orphanage instead.

characters.name: Ashura Ootsutsuki
characters.description: Ashura Ootsutsuki was the youngest son of Hagoromo Ootsutsuki and heir to his teachings. He is also the ancestor of the Senju clan, as well as the Uzumaki clan.

characters.name: Chino
characters.description: Chino is a kunoichi from the Chinoike clan. She was a member of the Lightning Group.

characters.name: Nowaki
characters.description: Nowaki was once the leader of the Lightning Group. At the time, he went by the name Fuushin.

characters.name: En Oyashiro
characters.description: En Oyashiro is a shinobi and arms dealer from the Chinoike clan. He would occasionally attend the Coliseum as a patron in order to collect kekkei genkai.

characters.name: Makibi
characters.description:
Makibi is the president of the Makibi Company and a patron at the Coliseum. He was spectating the fight between Raimei—the shinobi he contracted—and Suzuran when [Sasuke](https://anilist.co/character/13), [Orochimaru](https://anilist.co/character/2455), Chino and Nowaki arrived. Upon Raimei's victory, Makibi was seen very pleased with the outcome of the fight.

~!During Sasuke and Futsu's fight, he fell victim to Chino's Ketsuryūgan, but was saved by Sasuke's Sharingan before he exploded. He was eventually taken into custody when Kumogakure and Sasuke raided the Coliseum.!~

characters.name: Himeyuri
characters.description:
Himeyuri is the president of the Himeyuri Company and a patron at the Coliseum. She was spectating the fight between Suzuran—the shinobi she contracted—and Raimei when [Sasuke](https://anilist.co/character/13), [Orochimaru](https://anilist.co/character/2455), Chino and Nowaki arrived. Upon Suzuran's defeat, Himeyuri began aggressively scolding him. 

~!During Sasuke and Futsu's fight, she fell victim to Chino's Ketsuryūgan, causing her to explode and die.!~

characters.name: Ashina Uzumaki
characters.description: Ashina Uzumaki was the leader of the Uzumaki clan during the founding of Konohagakure. He was an elderly man that was still able to fight battles even during his 60s. He was very strong in Fuinjustu and kenjutsu.
